pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, December 16, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of New Brunswick, the Honourable Blaine Higgs.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
 Parliament Hill

Notes for media:   

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 9:00 a.m.

Media appearances

2:00 p.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on RED FM Toronto.

11:00 p.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CTV National News with Lisa LaFlamme.
